docs.title: XTM Hub Documentation Space
docs.text: Welcome to the XTM Hub Documentation space. Here you will be able to find all documents, meeting notes and presentations about the platform.

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: XTM Hub is a central forum to access resources, share tradecraft, and optimize the use of Filigran’s products, fostering collaboration and empowering the community.

docs.title: Getting started
docs.text:
• User Guide

    Understand how to use the app.

    Explore

Need more help?

We are doing our best to keep this documentation complete, accurate and up to date.

If you still have questions or you find something which is not sufficiently explained, join the Filigran Community on Slack.

docs.title: Blog posts
docs.text:

    Discover tutorials, best practices and deep dives on XTM Hub features on our Filigran blog.

docs.title: Additional resources
docs.text:
